SqlOutput.Sql: CAST(from_iso8601_date(CONCAT(CAST(CAST(FLOOR(COALESCE($!s0s!$.year__c, 0)) AS VARCHAR) AS VARCHAR),'-',CAST(2 AS VARCHAR),'-',CAST(CAST(FLOOR(COALESCE($!s0s!$.day__c, 0)) AS VARCHAR) AS VARCHAR))) AS TIMESTAMP)
SqlOutput.Guard: COALESCE($!s0s!$.year__c, 0) is null OR COALESCE($!s0s!$.year__c, 0)< 1 OR COALESCE($!s0s!$.year__c, 0)> 9999 OR COALESCE($!s0s!$.day__c, 0) is null OR COALESCE($!s0s!$.day__c, 0)< 1 OR COALESCE($!s0s!$.day__c, 0) >= 32 OR COALESCE($!s0s!$.day__c, 0) >= day(LAST_DAY_OF_MONTH(DATE(CONCAT(CAST(FLOOR(COALESCE($!s0s!$.year__c, 0)) AS VARCHAR),'-',CAST(2 AS VARCHAR),'-01'))))+1

SqlOutput.Sql: CASE WHEN $!s0s!$.year__c IS NULL THEN NULL WHEN $!s0s!$.day__c IS NULL THEN NULL ELSE CAST(from_iso8601_date(CONCAT(CAST(CAST(FLOOR($!s0s!$.year__c) AS VARCHAR) AS VARCHAR),'-',CAST(2 AS VARCHAR),'-',CAST(CAST(FLOOR($!s0s!$.day__c) AS VARCHAR) AS VARCHAR))) AS TIMESTAMP) END
SqlOutput.Guard: NOT ($!s0s!$.year__c IS NULL OR $!s0s!$.day__c IS NULL ) AND ($!s0s!$.year__c is null OR $!s0s!$.year__c< 1 OR $!s0s!$.year__c> 9999 OR $!s0s!$.day__c is null OR $!s0s!$.day__c< 1 OR $!s0s!$.day__c >= 32 OR $!s0s!$.day__c >= day(LAST_DAY_OF_MONTH(DATE(CONCAT(CAST(FLOOR($!s0s!$.year__c) AS VARCHAR),'-',CAST(2 AS VARCHAR),'-01'))))+1 )
